original_text: She is hardened against her young ones, as though they were not her's: her labour is in vain without fear;
korean_text: 그 새끼에게 모질게 대함이 제 새끼가 아닌 것처럼 하며 그 고생한 것이 헛되게 될지라도 두려워하지 아니하나니

sentences.original_text: She is hardened against her young ones
as though they were not her's
her labour is in vain without fear
